Articles.Content:
Presenting you Speeder k-101 , a ship with no modded parts , but with 4 stages and a lot of fuel!

Speeder k-101 at the Launch pad

Speeder k-101 at orbit(as always , Bill is freaked out)

Not to rain on your parade, but 400 m/s is not orbiting. At 40 km you need around 2300 m/s, that you won't get out of 2 tanks left in that craft. Here is a handy listing of the different speeds required to attain orbit at different altitudes. (all are in km). https://gist.github.com/1075144

Not to rain on your parade, but 400 m/s is not orbiting. At 40 km you need around 2300 m/s, that you won't get out of 2 tanks left in that craft. Here is a handy listing of the different speeds required to attain orbit at different altitudes. (all are in km). https://gist.github.com/1075144

ye when i made the pics i was in a hurry so i couldn't actually get into real orbit , you know...
